para.text: A petition under this subchapter may be filed only in a court that has jurisdiction to make a child-custody determination with respect to the child at issue under §§ 16-4601.01 to 16-4604.02.
A court of this state has temporary emergency jurisdiction under § 16-4602.04 if the court finds a credible risk of abduction.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Child Abduction Prevention Act.
